name: 1 minute of fishing
description:
One screen fishing survival game

Made during the 2019 GMTK Game Jam in 48 hours where the theme was "only one" Here there is only one : key, direction, minute of life, enemy,  resource, and screen

Controls:
Press the "1" key to dash against the wind and select upgrade once you caut a fish

Objective:
Catch fishes before dying out

Use caught fishes to get healing and upgrades (press "1" to select and time it well)

The upgrades are:

longer fishing pole (make catching fish easier)

more powerful fishing pole (make catching fish faster)

speed (makes you move faster)

health (add 30 second of life which is half your bar)
